mirage-skin-desc: Mirage is a responsive skin that focuses on displaying content with a rail on the right
mirage.css: /* CSS placed here will affect users of the Mirage skin */
mirage.js: /* Any JavaScript here will be loaded for users using the Mirage skin */
mirage-expand-submenu: Show the entries for the sub menu
prefs-mirage-max-width: Always apply the maximum page width
prefs-mirage-partial-max-width: Apply the maximum page width only to articles
prefs-mirage-toc: Placement of the table of contents:
prefs-mirage-toc-legacy: Show the table of contents in the article body
prefs-mirage-toc-hybrid: Show the table of contents in the article body and as a right rail module
prefs-mirage-toc-right-rail-only: Show the table of contents as a right rail module
mirage-wordmark-file-warning: This file is currently in use as the wordmark for the Mirage skin.
